duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitate leads and manage the sales cycle for floor coatings products and services.
Develop and maintain relationships with clients and business partners, ensuring customer satisfaction and retention.
Manage on-site sales activities and oversee project management for floor coatings installations.
Provide accurate estimates for products and services, coordinating with crews, facilities, and clients for project execution.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, or a related field (MBA preferred)
